newsitem.title: BELGIUM: TABLE - Artwork says Q3 net down 14.8 pct.
newsitem.headline: TABLE - Artwork says Q3 net down 14.8 pct.

text.p: (in millions of Belgian francs unless stated)
Results for first nine months to June 30, 1997.

NOTE: Artwork Systems develops software for professional colour printing preparation or pre-press. It said in a statement the main factor influencing the third-quarter results was decisions by prospective customers in Europe and the United States postponing purchase decisions until after the two main print trade shows in Dusseldorf, Germany, on June 4-10 and Chicago on September 3-10.
The company said in a statement it was confident growth would resume after the delaying effect of the trade shows -- which take place every four and five years respectively -- had faded.
